metadata.name: 1st January 2022
metadata.description:
Rainb0ws is a project by my five year old son, Theo. He likes to draw rainbows because they're colorful and he draws me one (almost) every day. Like Beeple, but younger. And more rainbow-y.

We've created rainbows as project to share with everyone. When you buy a rainbow you're buying a little piece of art to brighten up your day, and something that makes a nice Twitter background image. PFPs are so last year!

Plus of course, you get a hand drawn artwork which you can download and use as you'd like, and a video showing how it was made - just click on the image on your marketplace of choice to view the video.
